description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at 25 CFSD Montreal and 7 CFSD Edmonton by October 2023.
full_summary:
### Notice of Tender: Sleeping Bag Procurement

**Tender Announcement**
A Notice of Proposed Procurement (NOP) has been issued by the Department of National Defence (DND) for the procurement of sleeping bags. Due to ongoing COVID-19 pandemic impacts, bidders are encouraged to submit electronic bids through the epost Connect service to aid with expedited delivery and reduced staff availability.

**Procurement Details**
The procurement objective is to acquire two (2) quantities of sleeping bags totaling twenty-five (25) units each. The items will be delivered to 25 Canadian Forces Support Establishment (CFSE) Montreal and 7 Canadian Forces Support Establishment (CFSE) Edmonton by October 2023.

**Specifications**
Each sleeping bag is equipped with the following attributes:
- GSN: 8465-20-004-7461
- NCAGE: 09511
- Part Number: ID-08-280
- Quantity: 25 units for each location

**Submission Requirements**
Bidders must submit a formal bid in one of Canada's official languages. For bidders offering equivalent or substitute products, a brand name, model number, or part number, along with the NCAGE (North American Industry Classification System Code), is required.

**Crown Reserves Negotiation Rights**
The Crown retains the right to engage with various suppliers in the procurement process to ensure the most optimal delivery of the required goods.

**Submission Methods and Languages**
Electronic bids may be submitted. The documents being submitted may be presented in either of Canada's official languages.

### Contact Information
For inquiries, please contact:
- Name: Dany Lebel
- Email: [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)
- Phone: (000) 000-0000

**Required Documents**
The tender documents can be accessed and downloaded from [this link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6303/w8485-247685-a-solicitation-en.pdf) for English language documents and [this link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6303/w8485-247685-a-solicitation-fr.pdf) for the French language documents.   



**Note**
This tender is cancelled due to no requirement.  

**Tender Details**
- Tender reference number: cb-6303-11958994
- Solicitation number: W8485-274
